# ''Availability:'' The package is in universe and built on all platforms (http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/libc/libcdio/)
# ''Rationale:'' This library is far superior to cdparanoia for CD access and provides replacement cdparanoia  binaries.
# ''Security:'' No security history.
# ''Quality assurance:''
** Standard libcdio3/libcdio-dev split
** No configuration required after installation
** The program is under active development upstream
# ''Standards compliance:'' The package meets FHS and debian-policy
# ''Dependencies:'' All dependencies are in main

== Reviewers ==
MartinPitt: approved; however, the package should not be seeded, but pulled in as a dependency
